    1: import pytest
    2: 
    3: import pandas as pd
    4: import pandas._testing as tm
    5: 
    6: 
    7: @pytest.mark.parametrize(
    8:     "to_concat_dtypes, result_dtype",
    9:     [
   10:         (["Float64", "Float64"], "Float64"),
   11:         (["Float32", "Float64"], "Float64"),
   12:         (["Float32", "Float32"], "Float32"),
   13:     ],
   14: )
   15: def test_concat_series(to_concat_dtypes, result_dtype):
   16:     result = pd.concat([pd.Series([1, 2, pd.NA], dtype=t) for t in to_concat_dtypes])
   17:     expected = pd.concat([pd.Series([1, 2, pd.NA], dtype=object)] * 2).astype(
   18:         result_dtype
   19:     )
   20:     tm.assert_series_equal(result, expected)
